summary:
Based off of hothtrooper44\'s Immersive Weapons v1.1
This tiny tiny patch simply changes the six new arrow types to behave neatly with headbomb\'s better sorting mod.
descriptionHtml:
ATTENTION: Currently requires Immersive Weapons v1.5. If you have v1.1, or v1.2, be sure to download the proper file in the \"Old Versions\" section.

***Note: My version of this patch will match the version of Immersive Weapons that it is to be used with.

=======================================================

[BEFORE]
An-Xileel Arrow
Dariit Arrow
Dragonsteel Arrow
Exotic Arrow
Justiciar Arrow
Seeker Arrow

[AFTER]
Arrow - An-Xileel
Arrow - Dariit
Arrow - Dragonsteel
Arrow - Exotic
Arrow - Justiciar
Arrow - Seeker

***Note: The exotic arrow was missing the projectile component on the ammunition attribute page. This has been fixed in Immersive Weapons v1.2, however if still using v1.1, my older patch will fix that problem.

=======================================================

Installation: Simply extract the .zip, and overwrite your current Immersive Weapons.esp with this one. Always make a backup of your old .esp first! You never know!

=======================================================

ABT - Arrows and Bolts Tweaks: If you\'re using this mod by Kevkas, you\'ll be happy to know I\'ve included a second file just for you! It has the better sorted arrow names AND makes them 50% faster with the correct 0.20 gravity change to match the rest of your arrows.

ACE - Combat Skills: If you\'re using this mod by Athyra, I would stick with default speeds and NOT use ABT as long bows vs short bows have different speeds already. However, you could certainly change the gravity to 0.20 to give them a bit straighter flight path. As of now I\'m using ACE and I have uninstalled ABT.
author: StealthRedneck
